title: Baggage Conveyor Jam
description: One of the baggage conveyors in Terminal A has jammed, causing delays in luggage delivery.

title: Foul Odor in Restroom
description: Unpleasant smell detected in the restroom near Gate B12, affecting passenger experience.

title: Security Checkpoint Congestion
description: Long queues observed at the security checkpoint in Terminal C, causing delays for departing passengers.

title: Food Spill in Food Court
description: A large spill of food and beverages occurred in the food court area, creating a slip hazard.

title: Broken Escalator
description: The escalator leading to the departure gates in Terminal D is out of service, requiring maintenance.

title: Flight Delay Announcement Failure
description: The public announcement system in Terminal E failed to notify passengers of flight delays.

title: Lost Luggage Report
description: Passenger reported their luggage missing upon arrival at the baggage claim area.

title: Unauthorized Drone Activity
description: Unauthorized drone spotted flying near the runway, posing a potential safety risk.

title: Broken Vending Machine
description: One of the vending machines near Gate F5 is malfunctioning, not dispensing items properly.

title: Passenger Altercation at Boarding Gate
description: Two passengers engaged in a verbal altercation at the boarding gate of Flight 123.

title: Gate Change Confusion
description: Passengers are confused about a last-minute gate change for Flight 456, causing congestion and frustration.

title: Emergency Medical Assistance
description: A passenger has collapsed near the baggage claim area and requires immediate medical attention.

title: Fuel Leakage on Tarmac
description: A small aircraft is leaking fuel on the tarmac, requiring urgent containment and cleanup.

title: Power Outage in Terminal
description: A sudden power outage has occurred in Terminal F, affecting lighting, escalators, and flight information displays.

title: Suspicious Package Found
description: Security personnel discovered a suspicious package left unattended near the check-in counters, prompting evacuation protocols.

title: Bird Strike on Runway
description: A bird strike has occurred during takeoff, necessitating runway inspection and potential flight delays.

title: Water Pipe Burst in Restroom
description: A water pipe has burst in the restroom near Gate C7, flooding the area and rendering it unusable.

title: Lost Child Report
description: A child has been separated from their guardians in the crowded concourse area, requiring immediate assistance.

title: Air Conditioning Malfunction
description: The air conditioning system in Terminal D is malfunctioning, causing discomfort for passengers and staff.

title: Luggage Cart Collision
description: Two luggage carts collided near the departure gates, causing minor injuries and obstruction.
